question:
Which of the following statements are correct about United Nations Forum on Forests (UNFF)?
1. The forum aims to facilitate implementation of forest-related agreements and foster a common understanding on sustainable forest management.
2. It aims to foster policy and programme coordination on forest-related issues.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The United Nations Forum on Forests (UNFF) aims to facilitate implementation of forest-related agreements and foster a common understanding on sustainable forest management. It aims to foster policy and programme coordination on forest-related issues.
